website_summaries.verdict: These affordable, lightweight cases come with 360° spinner wheels, TSA locks, and retractable handle.
pros: The 20", 24" and 28" cases can nestle inside each other for storage
Lots of color choices, and also available in sky blue as a set of 4 (adds a 16") for a small upcharge
cons: The TSA-compliant lock threw out some glitches and needed to be reset
The zippers are not expandable, and it's not entirely dent-proof

customer_reviews.title: International travelers
customer_reviews.text: My family travels internationally which means lots of airplane transfers, rail, ferry loading and unloading. Each member has their own set. Only one cosmetic scuff has appeared. About to order another set for my mother as we are taking her to London, Scotland and Ireland for the holidays. We rarely use the middle size. The small size we carry on and the largest size we check. Very pleased with maneuvering and durability of wheels on various rough surfaces. The retractable handle makes for easy storage on ferries and railway. We’ve had zero issues with locking mechanism. We are a family of 4 with kids age 8 and 12.
customer_reviews.author: ChiefLaughALot

customer_reviews.title: Loved it however very disappointed after my first use one ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it however very disappointed after my first use one of the bags cracked. It should last longer than one flight. Update - The Company reached out within 24 hours of my review to address the situation. I was very impressed with their customer service and their desire to have happy customers.
customer_reviews.author: P Pep

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw the reviews I was like dang I shouldn’t buy this luggage but I still took a chance because I needed cheap luggage. And I am a very satisfied customer. My luggage survived my first trip. I would recommend luggage covers because they can get scratched easily but to me that’s not an issue. My belongings being secure and my luggage not being damnage were my only concerns. And they were not damaged at all. The preset lock code worked fine too and it was easy to reset the (000) password to what I wanted it to be. So yes I would definitely recommend this set. It’s definitely cheap and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wheels lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This item came quickly I received just in time for our trip. This luggage is awesome. We went to Hawaii for 10 days held all of our items plus a few extra on the trip home. The suitcases are lightweight and roll with ease. I loved the zippered section nothing fell out. The wheels roll well especially in the busy airport. Outsides are very durable. You can pull the handle up and set your backpack or extra bags on top nothing falls off. This is the best luggage I have owned so far. I will be taking it to London in December.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product needs work but Customer Service is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to go on vacation. I used these once, with the zipper not working on my returned. I had to tap my suit case closed on my returned flight. After writnig this review the manufacture contacted me directly and credited my account for the issues I had with the suit case. Although the product may need work, there is a lto to be said about customer service! Thank you Mia for contacting me and working with me on a solution!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Time for new luggage
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new luggage set. They came today. I won't be traveling with them until July. They look really great. I will let you how the trip goes. At this moment, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: may e howard

customer_reviews.title: Easily Glide When Pulled
customer_reviews.text: After a week of traveling I am quite impressed with this luggage. It has withstood the rigors of daily movement from my pick up to whatever hotel my wife and I happen to be staying in during this six state journey. I was doubtful at first whether I would find this luggage to be any better than anything I already owned. My doubts have been alleviated. These pieces are a charm to handle. They glide easily and the telescoping handles lock into place firmly. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: By CJs Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great Luggage at a Great Price! There is nothing about these that I DIS-LIKE! They are brightly colored, which; for me, makes it easy to find them on the Airport Luggage turnstyle, and; all the featues are fantastic - they will server you well! Handles are a MUST, and they are easy to pull and push and turn! I like that you can stack-them inside one another to store, and; they are worth the price - at just about $100 for the entire set of 3. Truly fabulous indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Roger K. Mukai

customer_reviews.title: The green apple is truely green apple and not a dull green. I am pleased with the material and ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this luggage set and the color is absolutely stunning. The green apple is truely green apple and not a dull green. I am pleased with the material and quality of the luggage. The packing was simply amazing. Lots of styrofoam, cardboard and plastic wrap for protection. Also, the luggage was shipped in a box and then that box was placed inside of a larger box. I appreciate the added protection towards my purchase. My set arrived free from any damages. I plan to order additional sets in various colors.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not TSA locks
customer_reviews.text: The luggage came without a tsa lock as advertised! There was a lock but it was a regular lock which defeats the purpose! Disappointed as we are now left scrambling for luggage for an upcoming travel Wish amazon fullfillment would double check on the quality of items before it ships
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and it made traveling with a large ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product before taking a vacation. I love the color and it made traveling with a large suitcase so much more easier. Although I did have a slight issue with one of the items, I contacted Coolife and received a response almost immediately. They worked with me and my issue was resolved in a short time. There was no run around or jumping through hoops which is what normally happens. The customer service is excellent and I'd recommend this company to anyone. I look forward to using this product for a nice long time. Thank you again for the fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.author: twin

customer_reviews.title: great luggages bought 2 sets of these just came back ...
customer_reviews.text: great luggages bought 2 sets of these just came back from a international trip it went though a lot of beaten came back with a few scratches other then that yes I would highly recommend this product to any one>
customer_reviews.author: Wadeea

customer_reviews.title: Broke on second use, customer service not helpful
customer_reviews.text: Out of all of these suitcases, most of the zippers broke off the second time I used them. The rest of the zippers broke the third time I used them. Customer service was frustrating enough that I gave up trying to get any sort of replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Broke 1st use! Don’t waste your money on this set.
customer_reviews.text: I had super high hopes after reading the great reviews. Well.. from Boise to Kauai with only one transfer of luggage the largest suitcase cracked right above the wheel. Not a small crack but a very large chunk out of the suitcase. This didn’t even make a round trip without breaking. Don’t waste your money on this set. I had better luck with a cheap Walmart set I had for years of traveling. Very disappointed that I now have to buy another large suitcase before our next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lakerzgurl2

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are nice. Looks like theyre gonna fit a ton in ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizes are nice. Looks like theyre gonna fit a ton in them. The greens a bit brighter than in the picture. Dog not included. Hes there for size comparison. I think he could fit in the 29” honestly but he wouldnt have much space for stretching lol will update when i actually use them in a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Sarahhhhhhhhh

customer_reviews.title: Loved the 4 pieces and the bright blue color-it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the 4 pieces and the bright blue color-it makes it so quick and easy at baggage claim. I was nervous after reading peoples’ reviews on the set after purchasing only because of how negative they were. I’ve traveled to Florida from Mass, and then from Mass. out to Colorado., and no issues with the bags breakin. I used packing organizers to help me for all of my products. I really enjoyed using the smallest two pieces as carry ons- super lightweight and compartmentalized.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: took these on a trip from SFO to Thailand with a stop over in Singapore each way. after an initial problem with the one lock needing to be reset(solutions to this in other comments or YouTube) the set did absolutely great on its first overseas trip. We don’t travel that often and the value for my family of 5(plus one duffel bag to check in and we were fine). Will update if any problems going forward. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly priced and tough
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and the color was awesome for recognizing my luggage from the rest. I got comments on my luggage from TSA agents all over the country saying they wouldn’t miss my luggage from a mile away and quick recognition and quality is what I was looking for and you delivered it with style.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: This luggage appears to be well made and the wheels are nice..
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this luggage in blue but my roommate bout it in purple and I wanted you to see the color. I will post the blue luggage when it arrives. This luggage appears to be well made and the wheels are nice...they move quite smoothly. I think this is a very good buy for $119 for 3 pieces. The luggage is super lightweight. With that said, understand that it may not be as durable as the expensive luggage. If it gets banged the wrong way really hard, it might crack but from the looks of it, it appears very sturdy. I think this is quality luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made at all !
customer_reviews.text: So after only using this for a week long trip its already falling about and zippers getting stuck and strap broken on large suitcase ..Really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Curt C

customer_reviews.title: How do one claim the warranty ??
customer_reviews.text: I just used the suitcase a couple of times and never overloaded the suitcases, i was really surprised to see that the wheel for the biggest size already caved in. Hope that i can get this resolved with Coollife as i really was impressed with all the reviews but my expectations are not met
customer_reviews.author: Kabir Kohli

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! It will break! Updated review**
customer_reviews.text: Product is not heavy duty. Already one wheel is broken. The seller never responded to a return request. I will never order again!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Good company
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and the cases roll nice but after one use material is already ripping inside suitcase.the company promptly contacted me and took care of the problem. Also added they will plan to upgrade materials
customer_reviews.author: GoodtoGo

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the suitcases when I first got them. Nice and light. However the zipper broke on the large suitcase on my third airline flight. Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Backpacker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Took these on vacation, took a couple flights. Everything survived wonderfully. No issues at all. Color is great too. Stood out compared to all the black and blue luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and sleek look!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet so I will update. My review is based on my initial impression while packing for my trip. They seem durable and are not cheaply made. So far they move pretty well on carpet so I'm sure it will be even smoother on floor. I love the look and prefer solid colors so the black is awesome. I like that it has a lock and is TSA approved. Hope the video is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: The first time I used it the handle broke while ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it the handle broke while picking it up off airport Carasol how can I get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat skeptical about buying this luggage after reading reviews. I figured I’d try because the price was on point and I needed it for a trip. I am very happy with this purchase. The luggage is lightweight and yet sturdy. I love the zippered divider and the extra pocket, also zippered. The red is a great color and I saw it immediately when it came through at the airport. Wheels glide nicely and the handle is light and is easy to maneuver. For the price, you can’t do much better!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi C

customer_reviews.title: Just as Described
customer_reviews.text: These arrived and are just as described. The quality looks and feels amazing! I had no issues with the locks (like some of the other reviews) and I was able to easily reset all of the lock codes. PS: The way the lock is designed is pretty ingenious IMO. I can't wait to try these out in a few days! Will update review if there are any issues, but they are already better than what I currently own.
customer_reviews.author: W. Werner

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED TO 3 STARS:  Not the most durable!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: While I'm still disappointed about the product, I am shockingly happy with the customer service that CoolLife has provided. Within hours of posting my rating, they contacted me asking how they could help, etc. I am grateful for them and wish every vendor at Amazon worked in this way! ORIGINAL: Was super excited about how light this suitcase was and how well the wheels maneuvered........ Then I took a single flight and obviously the lightness also translates to lack of durability!! One flight and a big hole right in the side! ;(
customer_reviews.author: G. Pulver

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage went full force right out of the packaging and got me from Michigan to Vancouver and back! Lightweight, durable and smart design. Love the ability to zip down one side and get packing on the other side. I was surprised at how easy it was to zip closed as I packed it (as it turns out) well past the 50lb limit; no sitting on it and struggling.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Luggage purchased at the last minute (Our Fault) for a vacation. Luggage came and when we went to pack the suitcases, we discovered the inner liner zippers were sewn in backwards and did not have a zipper puller on them. Suitcases did not have an extra expander zipper on them either. The suitcase rolled very easily and was lightweight - Only gave it a 3 for durability as we only used it once - suitcases were marked up more than others I purchased but that may be the color. I usually order black and this time I ordered the silver. I would not purchase this brand suitcase again and will plan ahead instead of waiting to the last minute. :(
customer_reviews.author: Linda #62

customer_reviews.title: it bents easily. The wheel on the big one broke on ...
customer_reviews.text: Weak material, it bents easily. The wheel on the big one broke on my first vacation, I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica C

customer_reviews.title: Lock breaks
customer_reviews.text: Carry on lock broke when I got to my destination could not reset the code code not open it all with that right code. Had to get pliers to pull back the metal in the zipper to open it. This happens in day one of my 17 day trip. It was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: DianaSPanorica

customer_reviews.title: The best economic luggage with cool colors
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is light. The colors are cool. The price is right. We used these for a recent trip and they held up well. The wheels on the bottom of the luggage made the luggage easy to maneuver. The light weight allowed for some extra clothing to be packed. The zippers are work easily. The combo locking the zippers in place is a nice feature. The shell held up well for the first trip we used the luggage on. I am curious about the longevity or the product and how long they will hold up. The manufacturer offers a 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Haylex Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great color and durable so far
customer_reviews.text: Love the color!!!( lime green) spotted my luggage from 4 carousels away and made the trip from LA to Boston with only a few scuffs. Rolls so easy. Doesn’t have the expandable feature and I forgot to check that when I ordered it but still lived it and so lightweigywas able to get more than expected in there anyway. Recommend especially the bright color
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: Best luggage and customer service ever!
customer_reviews.text: I use my luggage hard! I bought my first set of red luggage almost 2 years ago. Just a few months before the warranty was expired, the wheel was broken during a flight on the large case. I wrote to Coolife and they refunded the dollar amount of my large case. I love them so much, I bought another 3 piece set in bright orange. Anxious to use my new luggage. Rugged and sturdy! Thank you for great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cline

customer_reviews.title: First trip disappointment. *UPDATED*
customer_reviews.text: First trip and we have a huge dent. Not sure where it happened: Detroit (start of trip), Atlanta (layover) or St. Lucia (final destination). Pic is of midsized bag. We also had the largest bag checked (purple) and it was not damaged. We'll see what shape this bag is in when we go back to Detroit (6 days). *UPDATE 05/24/2019* There was no more damage to the bag on the flights back. The larger purple version experienced no issues during the entire trip. The company reached out to me shortly after I posted the review and offered a more than fair resolution.
customer_reviews.author: David Goralski

customer_reviews.title: If you are considering this set.. JFYI... no key.
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful. I love it! BUT... they do not tell you, (I don’t fly much) that this comes with a combination and key hole lock. The combination is for you. The keyhole is for the TSA agent who by the way, has the universal key to it. JFYI so you don’t have to wait 45 mins on hold with Amazon who will give you the manufactures phone number to call. Cool life rep. told me they get calls like this all of the time! Just thought it would be nice to let people know who didn’t. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: zipper broke and company would not replace
customer_reviews.text: I used the large suitcase 2x over a 3 year period. Both the outside and inside zippers broke, unfortunately when I was on an international trip. It taught me that I need to pay more attention to the zippers on luggage when I buy. I may even try to find one with no zips. I had to tape the suitcase shut to travel. Awful experience.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Check sizes carefully before buying
customer_reviews.text: The smallest case exceeds size max in cabin size for Alaska airlines and others by 1/2 in all around. So not ideal and will probably have to be checked. Middle size is a bit too small. Large case is good size for all purposes. But 2 of 3 bags are not an ideal size.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Worst
customer_reviews.text: We have only taken 3 small trips with these and they are already broken. One of the zipper locks wouldn’t let us unlock it which resulted in us having to destroy it to open our luggage. Another one cracked all around the bottom. I am super disappointed at the quality. They referred me to amazon and there’s no contact info that I can find.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this luggage. I just purchased it 1 and 1/2 mo ago for my trip I just took this past week. I loved everything about it and was excited to use it. My first use of this luggage and I got back last night, as it came toward me on the baggage carousel I could see it got banged up a bit. I know that u can’t stop luggage from getting banged up, but when I went to get it off the conveyor, the sliding handle was completely broken it just drops down and is cracked!!!! After 1 use. I am so upset and I don’t know who I can contact. VERY VERY BUMMED 🙁
customer_reviews.author: susan brown

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: At first I was extremely impressed but within the first 3 uses the combination locked up rendering the biggest one unusable. About 3 months later the same happened to the smallest one. So in a matter of just 5-6 months and maybe 10-15 usages I’m down to just one (which by the way the wheels don’t swivel anymore so it always trying to turn to the left when I pull it). Save your money and buy another brand
customer_reviews.author: Roy Blake II

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be ware
customer_reviews.text: We loved the size and wheels . However the zippers are poorly attached and the idea of using the zipper ends in a locking position only broke ours. Will never buy again ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Howell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage was perfect. I got the bright green options and couldn’t be happier it’s exactly the bright green I thought it would be. I shipped sensitive (breakable) items in them without a scratch, he divider sleeves are very handy and they feel like they are pretty rugged. As expected, when the luggage slides across the black belts (and since it’s bright green) it’s easy to see black smudges after the first trip but still looks good. The lock is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Seam came apart after ONE use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to travel to the Bahamas. Upon arrival, we started to unpack the suitcase. We noticed a large section of the seam had come undone. The bag was not over packed. This is very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT PEREIRA

customer_reviews.title: Seems great
customer_reviews.text: This set seems quality. There’s no shaky or wobbly pieces. We purchased for a family vacation next month. I will update if it doesn’t hold up to airline baggage handlers. I wish the family set were available in more colors, the only available colors were bright blue or orange. I would have loved this in the champagne color!!!
customer_reviews.author: Naturality

customer_reviews.title: If you want cheap—you got it!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay off—this will not hold up. The above picture was after one trip. Cracks by all the wheels on the medium size bag and one wheel fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Kammy Webb

customer_reviews.title: Carry on broke first use
customer_reviews.text: I travelled internationally and my handle was broken by the time I returned home. I had to go buy a new one separate from the set for an upcoming trip.
customer_reviews.author: Powers

customer_reviews.title: I like the color
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid they would dent like in the pics but after going through 6 airports (1 was an international airport) I am happy to say they have survived. They were great and only had a few noticeable scratches on them. People liked the color of the blue. I did have a slight problem with the zipper catching on the smaller case but was easily fixable after YouTubing it. Instructions for setting up your personal combination on the lock was found in the middle suitcase for us. You can also find YouTube instructions as well as troubleshooting videos if you need a tutorial. Overall I am very happy with these suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Better than other more famous brands I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the red/maroon set for myself. It held up so well and I loved the luggage so much, I bought the navy set for my niece. I searched and read many, many ratings for all brands of luggage and settled on Coolife. This luggage has TRAVELED! Multiple flights, through 5 countries in Europe. On a bus; on a train...and it handled like a dream. Love that the bags nestle within each other.
customer_reviews.author: Karan E. Segura

customer_reviews.title: Durability is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these suitcases to take on a trip out of the country and to transport some fragile items. Overall, I am glad I bought these, they served their purpose. However, after the first flight, there was visible punctures through the hard sided surfaces, multiple deep scratches, and creases visible where the hard side had actually bent. This was a little disappointing when it came to durability after one flight. BUT for the price, it got our items safely to their destination and I would probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: NOT TSA lock equiped
customer_reviews.text: blatant false advertising. This is NOT equipped with a TSA approved lock. items shipped do not look like pictured items. Unfortunate scam.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Worst Buy I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: Worst Buy I have ever made. First trip and the case slipt from the wheel Right down the side of the case. Poor manufacturing!!! Only good that has come from this purchase. Amazon has agreed to refund me in full. Let’s wait and see if they do?
customer_reviews.author: Meleney

customer_reviews.title: The cases themselves were nice, the wheels rolled smoothly
customer_reviews.text: The locks malfunctioned, even with the "fix" suggested by the manufacturer, it still didn't open. The cases themselves were nice, the wheels rolled smoothly, ic the locks weren't messed up I would not have returned the set.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but did the job.
customer_reviews.text: Luggage did the job. BUT, the zipper closer does not operate easily. You must manually lift the upper shell for the zipper to work. The only thing holding the two halves together is this zipper, which I predict will be the first thing to fail. When it fails the result will be catastrophic. I expect this luggage will be useful for a year or two and have to be replaced relatively soon. It was comparatively cheap when compared to much more expensive ”name brand” luggage. If I traveled a lot, this luggage would probably be too cheap to be considered.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Great Inexpensive Luggage Set
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set is a great deal for the price to receive three durable, modern, nice-looking cases. They’re lightweight and are easy to move. Mine did scratch a small amount, but that doesn’t bother me as I just assume that’s going to happen. Lots of room, even for a big over-packer like me. Plus, I really like the way they look, I ordered the silver/gray. Highly recommend. Great deal, good quality!
customer_reviews.author: PrettyP

customer_reviews.title: Useless lock
customer_reviews.text: Survived my trip to NZ, so that is more than I can say about a good portion of luggage I have purchased. Cheap or expensive, most end up with casualties, the result of couldn't-care-less baggage handlers. I've resorted to buying the least expensive suitcase I can find, knowing I will likely need to replace it for the NEXT trip I take. Only 3 stars because of the little combination lock on it. It is not designed to be TSA-accessible, so would have to be broken to be opened. I didn't dare to use it. --But the bag survived to see another day!
customer_reviews.author: LooziAnna

customer_reviews.title: One piece cracked after 2nd use. Company partially refunded.
customer_reviews.text: The color is great - my fav! But the large suitcase cracked on 2nd use. The company made a partial refund for the broken piece which was forthright and appreciated. One thing to note: The carryon does not expand. Since I often prefer to travel light and use only the carryon, that extra bit of space an expansion would provide is always helpful. That info may have been in the description or in reviews, but I didn't see it nor seek it.
customer_reviews.author: JelloCalipoo

customer_reviews.title: Good Suitcases with Poor Handles
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought two sets of these suitcases for our long trip abroad. They were lightweight and very easy to maneuver, but the handle on my big bag broke on the flight out. The bag was not over packed, but the handle snapped at the screw holding it together. Unfortunately we were traveling for too long to return the bag. I would recommend these bags, but be warned about the handles.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier!! Bought two of these for my family of four to each have a check and a carry on... they were easy to maneuver, even for my five year old (the smallest bag)... they were easy to spot at baggage claim. We went through 4 airports with no issues regarding quality. I love the TSA locks. Even my kids could open them with the code. They store easily. I just can’t say enough about how pleased I am with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color! Light weight and easy to roll.
customer_reviews.text: The green set is beautiful and seems really well made. I love the way they store together, we tend to pack a suitcase in a suitcase to bring home treasures from our trips. They roll easily in the house and are set to travel in just a few weeks. I will update if my review changes after they have been used.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Smart!
customer_reviews.text: Third set I have purchased. For me, Daughter and Ex Wife. I travel for work. Light, Strong, colorful and SMART interior. Been to the airport over 40 times and still rolling like its new. Good buy. Mark
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: SMALL!! Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Way to small do not waste your money and purchase this product I’m trying to return ASAP .. the suitcase takes up more space than my clothes can fit smh
customer_reviews.author: Leannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 4pk for family of 4!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this for our family trip! We bought the 4pk in Blue and everyone got their own suitcase. It was perfect. Mom got the 28”, Dad got the 24”, 4yo got the 20”, and 6mo got the 16”. It was sturdy and all compacts into one suitcase when not using. So glad we purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Moe

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic luggage set including all of the sizes you would need for a variety of trips. The color selection was great, and I appreciate that. We chose the royal blue which is pretty. I haven't traveled with it yet so hard to say how it will hold up. The wheel integrity is good. I am appreciative of the two year warranty on it and the excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: KellyH.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great! Inside features a little lacking
customer_reviews.text: It is fabulous looking and it moves and maneuvers great but I do wish the inside would have had a separation or pouch or something. It is just one big box when you open them. When the company saw these comments they responded right away to me. I was very impressed that they took the time & effort to do that and that they wanted to know more about how they could make their product better. I definitely would purchase other products
customer_reviews.author: Tchia C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not as good of quality as expecting
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set but didn’t hold as expected on our trip out of the country the lock on one of them broke, the material was super scratched I expected a better quality
customer_reviews.author: Mario & Daisy

customer_reviews.title: When they arrived I liked the color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the orange color. When they arrived I liked the color, however, when I unpacked the smaller ones housed within the larger suitcase I discovered they were diff colors.. the material seemed very flimsy.. I sent them back and was refunded very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Crack
customer_reviews.text: I love the color - so bright. They are lightweight and easy to roll. However, I recently used the 24" bag for the first time. I flew to and from a destination. When I got home there was a crack in one corner that kind of circles one wheel. Now, I won't be able to check this bag because I'm sure another trip through baggage handlers will result in the wheel breaking off.
customer_reviews.author: Cat 52

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, sturdy, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I wanted to buy the hard-sided, light-weight luggage that would hold up to the stresses of the TSA and baggage handlers. Well, I found it! This 3-piece set has the sizes you need, the durability everyone wants, and the style and colors that are new and in-style! At just under $140.00, this set delivers on all points! An option to get an extra year on the warranty means a three-year warranty will be there just in case I need it. Beautiful to look at and sturdy enough to pack it and forget it till it's time to pick it up! Love the color choices! Donating all my "old" luggage to charity, and sticking with the Coolife!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: After one big trip the suitcase I used is still in perfect condition. It is very easy to move, and I can even spin it in circles when I'm standing in line at the airport and bored. It's durable, and returned to me with no scratches after going through the airport system. I like the separators in the suitcase that made it easy to put my shoes in one section and clothes in another. The suitcase feels flimsy when it's open, but it is very strong and secure when zipped up. This is because the external material is very lightweight, but also very strong when zipped together. It's solid engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Gecko T

customer_reviews.title: NOT TSA APPROVED LOCKS
customer_reviews.text: Rather irritated with the false advertising! The locks are NOT TSA approved locks which is the whole reason why I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Milwaukeemedic3965

customer_reviews.title: These are worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if these were worth it, since I hadn't heard of the brand before. I also wasn't sure how well the hard-shell suitcases would hold up. I've used these on multiple trips and they still look amazing! I've had friends and family members buy the same set because they loved them so much. Also the TSA locks work very well. I've had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bjorge

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcases. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: These cases are awesome. Bought them last second before a trip. Great part is that they can fit inside each other when storing them. Cutting down the space needed. Pros: Highly maneuverable Comes with case integrated TSA zipper lock A flap that can be zippered to enclose one half of the suitcase Con: If I HAD to list something, it’s that I wish it were a bit more sturdier. While it is a hard case and better than normal soft ones, I feel that it could be dented. We had zero issues with it during our trip. Survived the brutal gauntlet that is the baggage handlers that throw it all around.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Arsenault

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, Small 20 in. and Large 28 in. overall size exceed Airline Maximum.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you plan to to travel by Plane. I will not be able to use my brand new luggage. Carry on [Cabin size] Small 20 in. overall measurements exceeds the maximum allowed by 2 14 inches. You will not be able to Carry on, you will have to check it in or otherwise pay A LOT of money [check with Airline to find out Cost $$$]. Same is true for the Large 28 in. [check in bag] overall measurements [62.75 in.] exceeds the maximum allowed [62 In.] by 3/4 inch. You will have to pay A LOT of money [check with Airline to find out Cost $$$] to check it in.
customer_reviews.author: Javier J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Delighted!  Flexible packing options!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of luggage! We recently went on a three week trip to ANZ that included two weeks of cruising. When we were packing, we tried assorted combinations of sizes and loved having that flexibility. They held up beautifully during our trip and we love the ability to beat them for storage. They are lightweight - but high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T. Jaques

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not without flaws
customer_reviews.text: So far these have served me well on occasional adventures. The sturdy sides are great but the color is rubbing off quickly. I have used all the luggage on my 3 or 4 trips so far. The largest bag is heavier than I expected. On my last trip I had packed it to almost the 50# limit, the shuttle driver was whipping it around, and both handles came off. Figured out the screws had stripped out of the plastic retainers in the handle. A little filler and super glue fix it right up but still maybe a stronger retainer would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great suitcases. They survived their maiden voyages to Germany and Europe, and the color helps make it pop on the luggage belt. Easy to manuever and carry, with a surprising amount of space inside (moreso then I initially thought). My only issue (if you can call it that) is that the zipper track looks as if it may be bent a little. There's no issue as of now, but I'm concerned that it may come off track in the years to come. As of now though, for the price that these cost, I would 100% buy again if I needed luggage. I absolutely love these.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Fuehrer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for your money
customer_reviews.text: My new luggage set just arrived and I can’t wait to use it for my next trip. Good quality and affordable! Coolife made it to my order basket and the rest is history. Do you want luggage that is fashionable and comes in many colors? Well head over to Amazon and type in “Coolife Luggage “, trust me you won’t regret it. You can’t go wrong with a 2 year warranty either.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The handle broke after one use and the company replaced it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these. I used it once and the handle of thr large case will not work. I reached out to the cool life even sent a video of the problem. Set multiple follow-up emails without a response. The case handle is still broke. I do not recommend spending your money on the product. The company set a replace for the damaged case. The color I purchased was not available. So I had tp select a radiant pink. Cool life sent it with in 3 days, so I had it for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Siebert

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this set over the weekend and have yet to test out the durability. The wheels work great which was my #1 complaint of my older spinner luggage so I hope this does the trick. Love the orange color,. We'll be able to spot it easy at the airport. One thing I wished I looked at was the ability to expand the suitcase. This one does not do that, not that I have used that feature on my current case but it's nice to have that additional zipper as a back up. Fingers crossed this one survives.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Simmers

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had a 2-week business trip to Europe and couldn't fit everything in the current bag. I thought I would use the big bag and pack all in one bag but ended up using the two smaller bags. Everything worked as expected and they were easy to wheel around when necessary. they seem fairly lightweight too. I did end up with a dented corner in one of the bags from the airport luggage handlers but it popped right out and shows only a slight mark where it occurred. I would recommend these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: 19 hour 3 planes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic luggage! I was skeptical at first when i saw people posting broken luggage but seeing these on the deal of the day and running out of time i bought them, 19 Hours 3 different planes and no scratches, no cracks, no missing wheels, or holes. Luggage is perfect and im so glad i took the chance. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Savymom101

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Tough, and Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: They stack well all inside each other for storage. Easy to use and rolls well (I'm in a wheelchair and can just hold it between my legs as I move around an airport, I travel a lot and these work really well). Pretty light when empty unlike some suitcases. I liked the orange - my bags are always easy to spot at the baggage claim. (And when I call uber for pickup I say "Orange Suit Case" in a crowd of 50 people they know exactly who I am and pull right up to me)
customer_reviews.author: regularjoe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move and use but very Weak and easy to damage. - UPDATE - AMAZING Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move and use but weak! Used my set one time and had a hole punched in the side. I know airlines can be hard on luggage but one would hope hard luggage could take a beating. UPDATE - After posting the vendor contacted me and wanted to make everything right. They replaced the luggage and went ABOVE and BEYOND to make sure everything was corrected. Can't recommend them enough. I wish everyone provided this kind of service. Wish I could give more than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Laurance

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect these to last
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic locks and overall construction. Took all 3 on a trip to Germany. After the first leg, the large suitcase was dented and lock was completely broken off. On the return trip the medium size case was also dented in.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: 6 Months and 4 Trips later...
customer_reviews.text: I've read some reviews regarding damaged pieces after minimal use so I was a bit skeptical at first. However, at this price, I couldn't resist and I am 100% satisfied with my decision. I waited a while before reviewing so I could get some use out of the set first. I'm sure anything can happen to any brand/style luggage but I believe this quality will hold up for many years to come. I did use luggage straps for the larger units.
customer_reviews.author: Dapalma

customer_reviews.title: Performed admirably on first trip
customer_reviews.text: I used the 28" for a trip from LA to KC. Lots of walking from car to terminal to rideshare to the hotel and the piece held up great. Its surprisingly light and well constructed. The only minor gripe would be that its maneuverability isn't the best. One anything but smooth flooring, it requires some effort to pull, the wheels often got caught in cracks and the uneven portion of the sidewalk. However, for the cost, its is a good, set and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for our intensive two-week trip
customer_reviews.text: We got these for a two week trip in Japan, and this luggage got a workout! We rolled it through train stations, subway stations, and over blocks and blocks of sidewalk and roadways as we made our way to our hostels and inns. We didn’t ever try to overpack them, and we experienced no problems. Sometimes when we were opening or closing the zippers, they would seem to stick when they reached the rear corners of the luggage, but all we had to do was align the top and bottom of the luggage and they worked just fine - it was always an alignment issue, never a jammed zipper issue.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not Expandable
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set had rave reviews on Amazon, and for the price, I decided to go ahead and purchase it. The item arrived well packed and is sturdy. I like several of the features of the suitcases, such as the built in TSA locks, durable wheels/case, and double zipper on the inside lining. The reason I gave it 3 stars instead of 5 is because the suitcase is not expandable. This is really a feature I wanted, so unfortunately, these may not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Starstruck750

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We only used the luggage once but the experience was great. The tsa locks worked perfectly, the color was nice and bright, and the luggage glided very well through the airport. Airport employees are so rough with luggage, so naturally there's a little dent in one of the bags; however, nothing unexpected or super noticeable. Even had a couple of black streaks I was able to rub off.
customer_reviews.author: Shae'ron Nikole

customer_reviews.title: Great Set For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this a 4 out of 5 stars only because I haven’t used it enough to test the durability. We just used the set on a six flights traveling from the US to Brazil and so far it seams to be holding up well. The price was pretty unbeatable for a three piece set with awesome reviews. We did not have any issues with the locks as others have mentioned. The instructions were straight forward. We do have some light scratches on the shell from our trip but that was to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Melanielane775

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use but customer service is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Update: COOLIFE’s customer service was very impressive. Someone reached out to my after my review of my issue and worked with me to rectify the situation by giving me a partial refund. I’m still a little disappointed about the broken zipper I still have but the partial refund makes up for my issue and hassle. I got this luggage set for a trip. I like that they are hard, the zippers come with a lock/code that you can set and they were just the right sizes. The color is also awesome to fine in baggage claim. Unfortunately after my first trip/use one of the zippers broke. I’m pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Feeney

customer_reviews.title: To much vibe and reviews for a cheap quality product
customer_reviews.text: I had so much hop on this luggage, however after the second time using it, I bought it in November 25th 2018, it started to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Perez

customer_reviews.title: just purchased more!
customer_reviews.text: The blue color is great! Luggage is nice looking and seems well made. Traveling internationally next week, so we’ll see how it holds up. I’m hoping the wheels are ok, I’ve seen better. Update- took this luggage to Jamaica from NY with no issues! They are easily spotted amongst all the other luggage. No scrapes, no dents and the locks worked perfectly! Like them so much we just purchased another 3 piece set in red! And the red color is really great!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE LUGGAGE!!! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three sets of this luggage. First of all, the preset code for my set, didn’t work, so I couldn’t even lock my suitcases. While on a trip to VA, both handles on my large suitcase broke, when carrying it. I had to purchase another suitcase. My daughter just called me from DC to tell me that the lock portion on her smallest suitcase broke, so now she can’t get into her suitcase. She had to get the hotel staff to use bolt cutters to get her suitcase open. I’m trying to locate a customer service # to contact someone, because I just want my money back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: diwillwalk

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Zipper breaks easily. Lots of dents. Spend the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: GiantsFan24

customer_reviews.title: 06/19/2018, I was just packing items to travel on ...
customer_reviews.text: 06/19/2018, I was just packing items to travel on 06/27/18 and the 28 inch zipper came off track and do not trust using it to travel because of the roughness at the airport. I will be receiving my items in a plastic bag instead of the suitcase because of the suitcase popping open once going through the baggage department???? The return date of 06/02/2018 has passed, so stuck with luggage I can not use. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

product_meta.title: COOLIFE Luggage 3 Piece Set Suitcase Spinner Hardshell Lightweight TSA Lock 4 Piece Set
feature_bullets: Warranty：Two Years Warranty. Please note that ONLY FAMILY SET has 4 pcs, please ignore the product’s title and select the set you want.
3 piece luggage set 20 inch,24 inch,28 inch upright, can be stored one into another.100% ABS, Lightweight yet extremely durable abs material.
Spinner wheels, multidirectional smooth and silent 360°wheels. Upgrade With TSA-Accepted Lock for security and peace of mind.
Interior mesh zip pocket and elasticated,Squared full-capacity design
